summary: Integration test module that validates the end‑to‑end GAN training workflow using MONAI. It generates synthetic 2D images, builds simple generator and discriminator networks, defines loss functions, configures a GanTrainer with checkpoint and statistics handlers, runs a brief training loop, and asserts successful execution.
business_intent: Automate regression testing of the GAN training pipeline to ensure that changes to the codebase do not break the integrated workflow, thereby maintaining reliability of the deep‑learning model training process.
